subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4713, how did it go?
description_text:
Finally the VAM-PRO arrived… good…the Simsonn software works well with
pedals calibration, however the haptic motors calibration and settings are
not working well… sometimes when ABS is active it starts to vibrate and it
never stops…. i am mow using SimHub to set the haptic motors and i find it
easier… however on f1-24 I can’t have haptic feedback….

Besides this everything is working out fine.

I know it’s not your software but if you have some tips to have haptic
feedback working on f1-24 I would be very grateful.

Thank you, Luca.
